remarks: The closure is monotonic under subsets of the original set of expressions and the set of disjoint variable conditions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mclsval.d $e |- D = ( mDV ` T ) $.
mclsval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mclsval.c $e |- C = ( mCls ` T ) $.
mclsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> T e. mFS ) $.
mclsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> K C_ D ) $.
mclsval.3 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ E ) $.
ss2mcls.4 $e |- ( ph -> X C_ K ) $.
ss2mcls.5 $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ B ) $.
ss2mcls $p |- ( ph -> ( X C Y ) C_ ( K C B ) ) $.
